snippet: Nikolaj Hübbe, whose Royal Danish Ballet is presenting his version of “La Bayadère,” is moving forward after the bumps in his first few years of artistic directorship.
abstract: Interview with Nikolaj Hubbe, artistic director of Royal Danish Ballet, discusses returning to Denmark after 16 years as principal dancer at New York City Ballet, his role in preserving legacy of Royal Danish Ballet and his vision for its future.
lead_paragraph: Nikolaj Hübbe, whose Royal Danish Ballet is presenting his version of “La Bayadère,” is moving forward after the bumps in his first few years of artistic directorship.

headline.seo: Nikolaj Hübbe Weathers Storm With Royal Danish Ballet
headline.main: Son of Denmark Faces Questions With Answers
headline.print_headline: Son of Denmark Faces Questions With Answers
